org.apache.hadoop.hbase.wal

类 RegionGroupingProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.wal.RegionGroupingProvider
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    WALProvider

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class RegionGroupingProvider
extends Object
implements WALProvider
    A WAL Provider that returns a WAL per group of regions. This provider follows the decorator pattern and mainly holds the logic for WAL grouping. WAL creation/roll/close is delegated to DELEGATE_PROVIDER Region grouping is handled via RegionGroupingProvider.RegionGroupingStrategy and can be configured via the property "hbase.wal.regiongrouping.strategy". Current strategy choices are
    • defaultStrategy : Whatever strategy this version of HBase picks. currently "bounded".
    • identity : each region belongs to its own group.
    • bounded : bounded number of groups and region evenly assigned to each group.
    Optionally, a FQCN to a custom implementation may be given.

    • 嵌套类概要

      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  RegionGroupingProvider.RegionGroupingStrategy
      Map identifiers to a group number.

      • init

        public void init(WALFactory factory,
                 org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                 String providerId)
          throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: WALProvider
        Set up the provider to create wals. will only be called once per instance.
        指定者:
        init 在接口中 WALProvider
        参数:
        factory - factory that made us may not be null
        conf - may not be null
        providerId - differentiate between providers from one factory. may be null
        抛出:
        IOException

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
              throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: WALProvider
        persist outstanding WALs to storage and stop accepting new appends. This method serves as shorthand for sending a sync to every WAL provided by a given implementation. Those WALs will also stop accepting new writes.
        指定者:
        shutdown 在接口中 WALProvider
        抛出:
        IOException

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: WALProvider
        shutdown utstanding WALs and clean up any persisted state. Call this method only when you will not need to replay any of the edits to the WALs from this provider. After this call completes, the underlying resources should have been reclaimed.
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 WALProvider
        抛出:
        IOException

      • addWALActionsListener

        public void addWALActionsListener(WALActionsListener listener)
        从接口复制的说明: WALProvider
        Add a WALActionsListener.

        Notice that you must call this method before calling WALProvider.getWAL(RegionInfo) as this method will not effect the WAL which has already been created. And as long as we can only it when initialization, it is not thread safe.

        指定者:
        addWALActionsListener 在接口中 WALProvider
